website_summaries.verdict: If you’re in the market for an ultra-sturdy portable speaker that effortlessly pumps out quality sound, you can’t go wrong with power, durability, and style of the BOOM 3.
pros: Official app provides additional control options
Pairs with up to 150 other UE BOOM 3 speakers at once
cons: Although this cylindrical speaker delivers deep bass and a clear sound, it is a fairly expensive model

customer_reviews.title: Critic reviews says this is Best Speaker in its Class. My ears still prefer Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my older Bose Soundlink Mini, I was unimpressed with the out-of-the-box sound of the Boom 3. However, once I downloaded the corresponding Boom app for iOS and adjusted the sound profile settings, the sound quality improved considerably. Bluetooth range is also weaker than the Bose, and I prefer the warmth and bass of the bidirectional Bose. Maybe I'm just not the target buyer for Ultimate Ears speakers (don't need 360-degree waterproof floating bluetooth speaker with "magic" button and "partyup" networking capability). Also: I feel the $40 upcharge for the separate charging dock is a cheap strategy. It should be included with the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: James Bratek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. Love the sound. I hang it in a tree at center of deck...sounds good all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Perfetti

customer_reviews.title: Audio Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing audio quality! Sound is slightly muffled, lacking highs, and slightly distorted. Also, the bluetooth pairing is unreliable as it shifts from one device to another by itself if both signals are present. I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SAMI SHOSHARA

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts 3 hours on high volume
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to have this supply your backyard with music all day, look elsewhere. We started the day with a fully charged speaker, and at a high volume, it only lasted 3 hours. We thought maybe we had a defective speaker, so we purchased another and the same thing happened. Whoever said this lasts for 15 hours between charges must have it at the lowest possible volume. Very disappointing since sound and price are great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great look, fake bluetooth?
customer_reviews.text: I was able to pair this device with my cell phone's bluetooth connection in seconds. The audio is excellent on the speaker. I then tried for an hour, to link it to my Amazon Alexa and Echo Dots to no avail. Nothing I do can get this device seen by Alexa. That was my sole purpose for buying this bluetooth speaker. Now I hate that I probably have to send it back, but I only wanted it for use with Alexa. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: An Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound, but great battery and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The good: Loud and clear sound, excellent battery life and waterproofing. Would be good for playing loud at beach or poolside. The bad: Not very good sound quality or bass. Bose Bluetooth speakers sounded much better 5 years ago. Makes a loud, obnoxious drumbeat sound at power up, Bluetooth on/off and power off. Makes it impossible to turn on soft music at work or home without scaring someone or waking someone up. You cannot to my knowledge disable this awful sound. Indoor at lower volumes the sound quality is sort of tinny/droning and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tye

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, I never even use it.
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I have a Harmon Kardon car stereo that cost much more than this, but my $100 2.0 Bose speakers I plug in sound much better than this thing. True, those are less portable and need a power source, but I really don't see myself using this other than for going to the beach or something where I don't care if it gets beat up a bit. Bass is just not low enough at 90hz for me. Didn't realize it was that high. Only ruggedness and portability are big here. If you want full sound, you will have to go with something else. I went for the Bang and Olufsen Beolit 17 for main home use as it's 37hz-capable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Battery on UE Boom 3 has died after 3 months.  What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: The Battery on this UE Boom 3 has DIED after 3 months. What a piece of junk. My JBL Flip 4 was purchased in Dec. 2018 and still has an amazing battery life and is going strong. Wow, I really liked the Sound of the Boom 3 for Pop Music, Theater music and classical, but unless the company agrees to immediately refund or send a brand new product, I will never buy a UE product again. More to come as I make my claim for a return. This purchase was fulfilled by Amazon. Amazon should back all electronic products for one year from the date of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Tentrees

customer_reviews.title: Sounds better than a cell phone speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I stay in rentals and hotels a lot while meeting up with out of town friends so I bought this since it's easily portable. I was looking for something that sounds better than a hotel alarm clock or cell phone speaker. I started leaving it in my bathroom at home too and listening to music when I get ready. This speaker isn't going to replace your sound system in the living room or anything but it would be nice for camping or a kayak ride maybe. I haven't tested it's water resistance yet but it appears to be pretty well sealed. It's the only device I own that still uses a micro-usb but those are still pretty prevalent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first month. Now 2.5 months in, this product, fully charged, holds a charge for about 1.5 hours. Not acceptable. Worst product that I've ever bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Crews

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good As I hoped For Cycling
customer_reviews.text: When it is stationary in a room, this speaker is great. However, I primarily purchased to connect several of these speakers on bicycles while riding. The pairing works, but once the speakers are more than 15 feet away, they start to shut down pretty badly. Total bummer. Once again, if you are looking for stationary speakers, this should be great. But not really what you would want to use on a bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: NOT even close to water resistant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take sailing on a catamaran. It survived only five outings, and those were the only times it was used. On the sixth outing, it was fully charged the night prior and when I pressed the button to turn it on, nothing happened. I thought maybe I didn't charge it enough or I did it incorrectly, so I charged it again and made sure the light was on. But, still nothing--not a tone or any from of operation happens when the button is pressed. Please advise on my options.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use. Support is bad when issues arise.
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. Great sound, easy to take anywhere and nice to not worry about water like rain or splashes effecting it. UPDATE: Charging cable stopped working just over 90 days from time of purchase. Called to see if I could get charger replaced. Person I was working with stated that return timeframe had passed. I could return the speaker and cable and pay a restocking fee. No interest in doing that. Was willing to return charger and pay restocking fee but person I was working with did not understand. I love the product but weary of support if something happens. I have a few of these speakers with no issues. Just painful that support is not better. 🤨
customer_reviews.author: Pepperjack23

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING speaker! With one draw back...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Clear sound quality -Long lasting battery (legit lasts me the 15 hours promised) -Waterproof (dropped it in the pool multiple times) -Drop resistent (dropped many times) -Easy pairing to my Pixel 4 Cons: -Not much bass -Takes a while to charge Overall this speaker is great. It excells in multiple areas. But the whole bass thing does suck for me personally. I miss the bass of my jbl but I honestly still love this speaker because of how well it performs in pretty much every other category.
customer_reviews.author: josh m.

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly Powerful and Durable small bluetooth speaker....
customer_reviews.text: UE Boom 3 is an amazing small bluetooth speaker. For it's size, the sound is spectacular and can fill a small room, or pool area or picnic. Waterproof, yes also dust and shock resistant and they FLOAT. Can pair a set as stereo, or up to 150 Boom or Megaboom speakers for large party sound. Honestly, for music, audible books, or podcasts and movies these sound GREAT! You definitely won't be disappointed with your purchase, and will probably end up buying more like I have. They'll fit in your backpack, clip to a bike, almost anything even down in a shower stall they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Vince V.

customer_reviews.title: App has issues...
customer_reviews.text: The UE Boom 3 places its app at the forefront but the app simply isn’t ready. It fails to see your connected speaker more often than not. Luckily, you don’t need it unless you want to use “join the party.” Other than the woeful app the speaker sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery life, DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery life, try to contact logitech and they only make me hard reset the speaker, Fully charged the speaker about 6 times and only lasted an average of 3.5 hours, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: edgar martin

customer_reviews.title: The one to end them all.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound combined with excellent connectability. Combine this with their charging stand, and it is the best BT unit I have put my hands on, and I've owned 4 to 5 others.
customer_reviews.author: W. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Sound System
customer_reviews.text: I travel for a living a loathe earbuds, so this is the perfect travel companion for the hotel room and connects to my iPhone though Bluetooth and the app is highly intuitive. It plays through any sound source, without having to necessarily merge with the app. The “playlist” setting on the app appears limiting, but you can play any resource through the Bluetooth connection and still control the volume through the app. The sound quality is very good and is just the right amount for the hotel room or at home in the kitchen, office, or bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The speaker worked so well for about 4 months. The sound quality and the durability was very premium. However, after around the 4 months mark, I started to notice a very noticeable static noise when the volume got a little bit higher than usual. For example, when the song reaches climax or if I simply turn it up higher. I’ve contacted Logitech support through email about 5 times over the course of 3 months to ask them to resolve this issue but heard absolutely zero from them. I’m shocked that a renowned company such as Logitech would have this atrocious level of customer support. Will definitely not purchase anything Logitech or ultimate ears again.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Beware this device cannot do deep base
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a little speaker and I shouldn't expect booming bass from it, but that's not the problem. The problem is that any bass tones below 90 Hz aren't low power, they don't exist ... at all. Everything below 90Hz is just gone, like a high-pass filter. Classical music sounds retarded when you can't even hear the cello or kettle drums. Rap sounds even more retarded, like the entire percussion track has been removed from the recording. I don't know how people enjoy listening to music on these things. I can only guess that it's the same type of people who can't tell the difference between a low-quality 128 kbps MP3 and a lossless FLAC file.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: No regrets 🤙
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical to buy since professional review articles recommended this speaker but the Amazon reviewers seemed to refute that. But as someone who is very aware of sound quality, I am satisfied with this. I mean, you don't get dual stereo speakers, but I guess that's normal for Bluetooth portable speakers. Battery lasts long. It gets loud. It's nice having access to the equalizer in the app. Purple color is super rad and almost looks iridescent.
customer_reviews.author: Ded Tanson

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Sound quality is poor; crappy base. Go with the Mega Boom and pass this one up. Or the Boom is better than this thing for half the price. Seems solid and has pretty good battery life if you can live with the mediocre sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shark Likes

customer_reviews.title: Very loud but low quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this highly rated speaker but I have to say, the sound quality is just subpar. It really sounds like the EQ looks like a bell-curve with loud mids but subpar bass and highs. The build quality, design, battery life, etc. are all great but in my opinion the most important aspect is the sound quality and it is not adequate in that category. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Morlan

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this everyday since I’ve gotten it! It’s super portable, the Bluetooth range from distance to my phone is awesome! It seems to be pretty tough and could withstand some travel and outdoors - I haven’t tested waterproof or things of that nature as that scares me. But it gets loud enough for small events or single. Sound quality is good for a portable mini speaker, it doesn’t rival my Sonos but that’s a totally different type of speaker for my home. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor battery
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Awesome app to show battery life and control speaker. Battery life is horrible. Received it on a sunday charged it fully and used it Monday morning. Last maybe 1.5 hours and died. Then would not charge back up. After several different chargers I tired it finally took a small charge in 4 hours. Played 3.5 songs on it and it died again while still plugged in. Amazing sound and operation but horrible battery and charging.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Sound is sub par, and plays loud sound effects out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is sub par. It's not awful, but a lot of the bass feels muted, and the highs get crunchy of volume is over half way. Not worth the price unless you really need something lightweight and rugged, maybe like for backpacking. The speaker also comes out of the box committing the one sin I will never forgive a Bluetooth speaker for doing. It plays sound effects for different functions such as pairing or volume, and even voice, and volume settings don't affect how loud the sound effects are. So if you need it quiet late at night when others are sleeping, you can turn it off, but only if you install the app. Luckily this is permanent.
customer_reviews.author: YellowNumber5

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a bathroom speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a UE roll 2. I use it as a shower speaker or a bathroom speaker I should say. It is a bit of an overkill for my uses. The UE roll 2 worked a bit better. But there is a monster sound come out of the this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love UE
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge speaker connoisseur. I have speakers ranging from Bose vintage entertainment speakers to music production speakers and everything in between. I have been using my UE boom (the original version) and it has lasted several years. I've let it sink to the bottom of lakes and pools multiple times to check the durability and quality of the port covers and surprisingly, it still works like it's brand new. I would 10/10 buy anything made by UE.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: really amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing for its size. For serious audiophiles it is probably pretty mediocre, but for your next pool party or BBQ it will be great. Surprisingly loud. I don't know about it's water resistance, but I've seen video of it being dropped in water and still working fine. This is my second one so I'm a return customer to this brand/model. If you gave me $150 to get an outdoor bluetooth secret, I wouldn't even waste time looking into other brands, I'd just buy this one again
customer_reviews.author: Ryan hale

customer_reviews.title: The speaker is good.  Battery is dreadful
customer_reviews.text: Man i want to like this speaker. When it works the speaker is great. But ever since i bought this thing the battery only lasts about 20 minutes. Obviously a Defective battery but it sucks considering how much i spent on the speaker. Not sure how to replace it either. I would not recommend at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best speaker on the market
customer_reviews.text: We have bought these since they came out with the first one and we have not been disappointed sound quality is great they are built to last and the battery life is fantastic if you are in the market for a speaker you would be a fool not to buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: OK sound, good for small gatherings and ambient music
customer_reviews.text: My initial sound quality opinion was, Meh, OK, acceptable, but no “Wow! Listen to that!” happening. However, after using it a a small gathering, about 10 people, I realized that “wow!” , the music carried very well, can be clearly heard 10 -15 feet away, without needing to be loud or intrusive to be heard far away: great for background music at a small party, or say, in a small business establishment or office. That feature worked well both indoors and when taken outdoors. I haven’t tried it yet at a big, loud, rowdy party, when you WANT the music to be loud and Intrusive, so I have no option on that. Build quality is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Roberti

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Portable Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this portable speaker! I would sometimes have trouble with the connectivity on my Bose SoundLink Mini but have never had an issue with the UE3. It emits rich, beautiful sound from every angle and comes with an associated app that allows you to change the equalizer settings. I haven't tested the water resistance capabilities and have no plans to. However, it is comforting to know that if the rain starts falling and it gets wet, it should still work as intended. This speaker will fill a whole room. I had it playing in my hotel room and could even hear it with the door closed in the hotel hallway. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Oneil

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up!! (as opposed to my TV soundbar - oof!)
customer_reviews.text: I got this to pipe music into the kitchen at my house and to play white noise while I sleep. It is perfect for both. I don't have a big place (750 square feet), but this is just the right size. It was easy to synch up with my phone, and I had Spotify streaming in a couple minutes out of the box. I didn't rate it for water resistance because I honestly have no idea how it does in that regard; haven't used it outdoors yet. I always have it plugged in so I couldn't speak to battery life either.
customer_reviews.author: LYDIA G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good 2nd
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality but the BASS is just missing. Can not compare to JBL charge 3. Podcast and video and music all were compared. JBL is a clear winner. Shame cuz I really wanted to like the UE Boom 3. Here’s the deal if you listen to ANYTHING that remotely has a little bit of bass - which basically is almost everything - JBL is the way to go. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: OVERHYPED and OVERPRICED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking it would be better than the Wonderboom. Let me tell you, I have a bluetooth INSIGNIA NS Brick from Best Buy that I paid $19.99 for and has way better sound than this overpriced overrated speaker. I am still debating on if I want to return it or not since I gave my brother my Brick. This one does have better battery, stability, range and is louder. This speaker does not have the bass. If you want the boom, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker so much! I had a Sony speaker prior which was completely inconvenient since the charge was not usb. This one is easy to charge, pack, and has amazing sound quality. I'm considering getting a second to pair up for large events.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m ultimately disappointed in this speaker for the $150 I spent I expected something I could take in the go with me to work, or even around the house, the charge doesn’t last very long at all, and you can’t even use the speaker while it’s charging cause it will just die... for the same money I could have bought several speakers much better.. don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Solid - Well built
customer_reviews.text: It is well built. Fabric is very strong with good heft and rubber pads. I got primarily to listen to YouTube videos and podcasts etc from phone or tablet. In this regards I'm well pleased. Portable, connects well and good battery life. I'm an audiophile so I have a discerning ear. My main complaint is speech and mids are muffled. Now I have a hifi system for movies etc and general music an Apple HomePod (which is FANTASTIC) clearest sound of any speaker I've used but not portable so used for music.
customer_reviews.author: SLCReader

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but a few disappointments
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product but I have a few things that I was surprised and disappointed with. The battery life is not long. I feel like every time I use it, it dies quickly. Almost to the point I’ve thought about returning it. It is waterproof but it stops playing music once it falls in water. We bought it to have by our hot tub and liked the idea hat it would float and play music. It does float but not while playing music.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: SHORT PLAY TIME
customer_reviews.text: I read quite few reviews on this speaker. All were good. The one thing I’m disappointed about is that the play time isn’t 15 hours at all. it’s not like 2 hours. When I figured it out it was too late to send back. It’s good when it plays but it doesn’t play for long.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker. We bought 2 and linked them together. Fills the room with sound. Best when placed in a corner. Using with a Motorola Android phone. If the phone gets a little too close to the speakers one will start to pop. No real issues like others have reported. Love the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: James Hurlock

customer_reviews.title: Love This Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I had the 1st gen UE Boom, and loved it. I recently lost it, so I had to purchase another. I love the improved size and sound quality, even though I loved the other one. I did purchase this, and the comparable JBL brand speaker. Though the JBL has a little more bass, this speaker has much better overall sound quality, and volume. Another really important feature that I love is the 360 degree sound you get from the UE Boom.
customer_reviews.author: Sherm

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this speaker
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. I did plenty of research prior to choosing this one. Honestly, there was no clear choice based on all the reviews. For all the speakers some people loved it and some didn't. Maybe I'm not an audio snob but I think the speaker sounds fantastic (can't say I love the music my son plays) and my son loves it. It is very portable and the battery life is great. I could easily recommend this to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G.

customer_reviews.title: Da Boom 3 is da Bomb
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. Not an audiophile but always listening to Spotify and podcasts. Clear sound, loud without distortion, and easy to control the volume. Great for the shower and light enough to pack for travel. Bought the purple to distinguish from my daughter's Boom 3 and find her switching with mine---same quality, she just likes the color (which wasn't available when she got hers). Average++ listener won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel's mom

customer_reviews.title: best features - doesn't listen to you plus excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: this is the best speaker that Logitech (Ultimate Ears) has produced - it does NOT support telephone or voice commands - it's just a speaker - to me this is a BIG benefit. the ability to know the battery (press and hold "Plus" and "minus" symbols simultaneously) is a big improvement to having to log into their app to see battery level. has remote on/off. great sound (I have boom2, and megaboom too - all have great sound. I use it in the shower every day. no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: dahboss

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: First off, it won't play any sound from any device i connect it too, I've paired and unpaired over and over, done the hard reset and still nothing, but the worst thing about this piece of junk.... every time you turn it on it tells you to download the boom app..... even though you have it on every device that you've connected it to, and they all paired correctly, but.... no sound! Spend your money elsewhere, the fact that it has to tell you to download the app every time is enough to drive you crazy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a few months:k
customer_reviews.text: Well we bought this in June and it stoped working with clear sound in October. 4 short months with great sound quality and then static! We looked it up and lots of folks have had the same problem! Sad when a product won't last a lifetim, I hate how items are made to be thrown away and replaced!!! Wasteful and money down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s not too bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about the water resistance but I gave it five stars anyways. I know it’s been wet before and I haven’t had any problems with it after. But it has been no means soaked. I’m an over the road trucker and I use it in my rig while I’m working. The sound could be louder and more defined but it does pretty damn good for what I need it for. The sound would be better though.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY SIMONS

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers when they can work with the app..
customer_reviews.text: It is *very* difficult to get these to work with the app (if you even know that you need the app). Sometimes they just decide to stop working with the app. Like 50 percent of the time, and then you're screwed. But when you *can* figure out what's wrong in the communication / networking / user-interface chain (after about 20-30 minutes of banging your head against the wall) they sound great and are very versatile & portable..
customer_reviews.author: John Bergquist

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is just...okay. Way overpriced. Should be in the 40 dollar range. Update: It stopped working after three months of light use. So now I have a very expensive doorstop. NEVER. BUY. AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: mjgroesbeck

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not as good as i expected.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I thought it would be great. The sound quality is just not that good. It could be much louder also. I think it lacks bass also.
customer_reviews.author: franz

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, great product
customer_reviews.text: We played with a bunch of speakers before deciding to try the Ultimate Ears Boom 3. It struck us as a nice balance between size, sound, battery, and price. It works with our Bluetooth iPhones and laptops and allows us to bring music into some "gaps" in our house sound system (such as the kitchen and outdoors). At the end of the day, it sounds good and it's easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Biddinger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is fantastic. The sound quality is great, durability is great (you can get it wet!) and it's easy to use. I've had each generation of this speaker and this one is the best yet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great 360 Sound and Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and a long battery life. The app allows you to play with the EQ which makes a noticeable difference. The 360 degree is stellar on the Boom 3. While it’s waterproof it doesn’t float upright and the music shuts off when it is submersed. Only reason for less than 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Delicious

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker puts out great sound! I am very impressed with how loud this speaker is and how great it sounds! I love the app as well. I think they're cute and easy to take along anywhere you go. The app lets you connect multiple speakers at the same time which is easily cool. It also lets you customize your sound! The speaker is easy to operate and it has a great battery life. My family loved this speaker so much that I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Quite a product, deserving it's reputation. The UE app is a must have to open up the maximum sound adjustment and other features of the speaker. I have two of these & the ability to play true stereo sound is extremely well done. Using only one still yields a rich, accurate, and imersable sound field. Totally pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rave Ono

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works, which is rare
customer_reviews.text: Got this speaker a couple weeks ago. Sound quality is great. Problem is that it cuts off constantly (not the power) and just stops playing. Speaker will still be on but it’s as if it loses its Bluetooth connection. It doesn’t matter what device we connect to it, it cuts off. Sometimes it doesn’t even make it through one song. Quite a pain. I can’t speak to waterproof-ness.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Gary-Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gen X’ers Who Miss Their Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s so much better than the box style Bluetooth speakers we’ve had in the past. The buttons are big enough for those with big fingers or with arthritis. It was super easy to set up and blends in to the decor. The sound is similar to having 2 speakers like we had on our boom boxes in the 80’s.
customer_reviews.author: WaldenBug

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Volume is less than a $40 JBL and bass is far less. Battery life is supposed to be 15 hrs but it won’t even hold a charge without use for that long. Won’t charge if the wall adapter you use isn’t an apple and doesn’t come with a wall adapter. I’m brand loyal but this is not what it’s made out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact speaker with amazing, 360-degree sound. Most bluetooth speakers only have sound on one side of the speaker, which limits the sound and how it carries through a room. Can't wait to buy another one so I can pair them. The speaker makes a drum beat sound when it powers on. Not a deal breaker for me, although I wish it was a more soothing sound or no sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenzai

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have not tested it ability to be waterproof but wanted one that was because I want to take it to the lake. So far great sound quality. Box says it only works with apple products. It has an app to down load with it but I don’t think it’s totally necessary to have. The app would allow you to connect multiple speakers I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Truly does boom
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this speaker. After deliberating for over 2 weeks between bookshelf speakers and portable speakers, I decided to get the Boom 3, and I truly am glad I purchased it. It is portable and gets loud. Don't let the size of the speaker fool you. In addition to the seamless pairing with the app, I was able to tune the equalizer to how I would like it. The bass is not overpowering, however, it is nice, punchy, and enjoyable. There is little to no distortion when listening to music at full volume, and the sound engulfs the room. 10/10 would purchase again to have a larger party!
customer_reviews.author: BigAl

customer_reviews.title: Unit worked initially with one device, but would not work with another IOS device.
customer_reviews.text: The device stopped working on the 2nd day, the sound had very little base...I'm not sure about battery life or waterproof because i did not have it long enough to know. I went and purchased the next level up MEGA BOOM3 and it has worked great. Great sound!!! I have left it out on the patio in the rain...no issue. If you can spring for the other $50 increase in price and a 20% larger size I would highly recommend you buy the bigger unit.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Dothard

customer_reviews.title: Quality counts!💯😊
customer_reviews.text: I have had these speakers in the past and love the quality of their products. They prove to be durable, easy to use, and last quite a long time... I must admit it does rank close to a JBL but in my opinion it is slightly better. The battery life is extremely great as I don't need to recharge it for a few days and I do listen to it quite frequently each day. I only hope they continue making great products!!! I do listen to it in the shower but haven't done a test to see whether or not it's ok after being submerged or exposed to a significant amount of water
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rose Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: We have a total of 5 in the house. 3 Boom 2's. 1 Boom 3, and 1 Megaboom 3. They are all awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Language & Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: The box, directions and all writing on this product is in another language. Not one word in English. This device will not pair with my iPhone Bluetooth even with my phone sitting on top of it. All my other Bluetooth devices connect to my iPhone just fine. I gave it two stars for those reasons. I do like the color
customer_reviews.author: Matt Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Audio Notification is way way too loud
customer_reviews.text: Audio Notifications is LOUD - the status sound and messages (turn on/off sound, battery charge level, etc) is so loud it’s painful, it yells things like “100% charged” as if I’m standing a mile away. Good speaker but this status volume is so grating, and I can’t figure out a way to lower it (update - Logitech says this volume can’t be changed.)
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Pez

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been an excellent speaker. I used to be a big fan of JBL Flip speakers until my Flip4 died unexpectedly and for no reason after 2 years. JBL said they couldn’t help bc I was out of warranty. This speaker has been fantastic so far and it’s great that sound comes out of the entire circumference of the speaker, unlike others which are mono. I haven’t tested the BOOM 3 in water just yet so cannot comment on that aspect of it. But otherwise, very happy with this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Diego Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: 🤘🏼
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good! But not as great as Jawbone mini jam box. I am too afraid to throw I. In the pool lol .... sooo can’t review on water resistant...
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the Boom 3 instead of the UE Megaboom. Huge mistake! This sounds like a tin can in comparison. I did like how small it is compared to the Megaboom, but the sound quality severely lacks. I don't understand why anyone would purchase this and genuinely feel satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: April S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a punch! Great sound quality, and I really like the color. I'm unsure of the water resistance - I don't plan to put that to the test. It would be nice if the battery held a charge a bit longer, but it's not really that much of an issue, as the speaker can still be used while it's charging. I take this thing with me everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Donna McSwain

customer_reviews.title: Better than the waterproof Bose equivalent
customer_reviews.text: Its such a good price for the sound. Yes, I struggled trying to connect to my computer and phone. After much moaning and talking to myself it was done. I'm not even going to try to connect them to my 10 year old smart tv. What did I have to do to get the bluetooth in my devices to find this thing. I'm glad I persevered. What a great sound. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss Gomez

customer_reviews.title: A great, beautiful Bluetooth speaker w easy-to-use app
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how much I missed hearing music on a speaker until I set up this puppy. Great sound, and I can lie in bed at night with the lights out and control the speaker w the very simple and useful app. Took maybe a minute to set up the app and speaker
customer_reviews.author: John Constantine

customer_reviews.title: The Cheapest worst  Company
customer_reviews.text: These cheap peope charge you 137.00 and will not give you a charging dock (sold separately) to charge Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 the worst who does this kind of stuff
customer_reviews.author: Winford  Wrice

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker after my Bose bluetooth speaker suddenly stopped working and I am so happy with my purchase. The sound is great and I love that I can finally switch songs via the speaker which my Bose was unable to do. You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Keep the party going
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!!! didn't have to buy a new one till my drunk ass lost it :( I had too keep the party going 🤘🏾🤘🏾🤘🏾🤘🏾
customer_reviews.author: Youngnhanny

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: The sound is OK, a bit harsh compared to another brand (starts with J, ends with L with a third letter in the middle... unfortunately I stumble on that one after this purchase), but the battery life is far better than it was from my Bose. Good design - grab it, throw it, drop it... it just feels solid. Great to take in your car or for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: ZoomerX

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, just not enough bass
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give it a try..ended up returning mainly just didnt have that deep bass/ rich lows..interface was cool from the app controls..it does get loud just not enough thump..wound up getting the jbl charge 4 and it was night and day on the depth of the bass..if thats not your thing, then this one is good, but if you like some "thump" then go with the jbl
customer_reviews.author: dammeon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through a few Bluetooth speakers in this price range looking for the right one. When I get a new one to try out I give the old one as a gift to family or friends. This is my favorite so far. Great sound. I put a locking carabiner on the strap and can connect it to a tube, raft, kayak, etc... very easily. It is a bit tall and heavy, but given its sound quality and features that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: AaA

customer_reviews.title: Defective Speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the speaker once, charged and stored it for over a month. I've owned UE ears before and it’s always held it’s charge at 100% when I’m ready to use it. I opened it today and it had no battery life, it’s been charging for an hour, the red light is still flashing and now it won’t charge at all. I want a replacement speaker! Amazon won’t replace - it’s not a good idea to buy this type of product from Amazon because they won’t replace defective items!
customer_reviews.author: mdd

customer_reviews.title: Tinny sound
customer_reviews.text: I had a JBL flip for 3 years which bit the dust due to a charging port issue. I thought I was upgrading with this speaker, but the sound quality is poor - it's very tinny sounding, regardless of how you calibrate the amp settings with the app. And on top of that it's barely any louder than the JBL flip 3. Returning this and going back to JBL for one of their newer models.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker so far...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak to the waterproof part as I do not plan to submerge this in water at any point, but all other facets of this speaker are wonderful. Great sound and I love the app that easily allows you to turn the speaker on and off from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jen A

customer_reviews.title: Tough and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Boom - they are reliable and sound very nice. We like the ‘party mode’ where two or more UE speakers can join to create a bigger sound stage - this works great a places like beach volleyball where we can play 2-3 speakers at lower level then cranking one to max and annoying neighbors. This Boom 3 takes it to another level with a waterproofing and floating capability that has survived and intentional dunk in the pool - it really floats!
customer_reviews.author: John K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: very good quality, but it lacks bass. I just compared with my old sony SR3 bluetooth speaker and it has more bass and sound quality, even being 2 years used. but its more modern, connect easily and pair with many more speakers. the lack of the option to charge your phone is also something that is an important missing feature.
customer_reviews.author: caiofogliene

customer_reviews.title: Not working - I had to pay to ship it back.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worked. It did not take a charge, the base was cracking, AND I had to pay nearly $30 to return ship it. THE COMPANY DOES NOT PAY FOR RETURN SHIPPING. 😡🤬😡🤬
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: Boom boom boom
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality speaker packs a punch and I love the color way. Haven’t tried it in water yet a lil nervous since I don’t think electronics and water should mix but looking at design I think it can withstand it as long as you close the USB port completely
customer_reviews.author: Pea money

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound in a sleek package
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy to use and switch from phone to phone. Love the magic button and the fact that I can set it up to auto play my Apple Music playlists. Great speaker and my new go to after my Bose soundlink finally gave out.
customer_reviews.author: Rob fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Lies from the seller. Not refurbished it’s a DEMO model.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving a 1 star review because the seller is selling DEMO models. It literally says “NOT FOR SALE” right on the speaker. Super disappointed by that. But the speaker seems to work well, charges fine, sounds great. Just disappointed that we purchased a demo instead of a refurbished item as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this speaker. Really good sound coming out of it, highs and lows strong bass os OK. The fact that this thing is dust proof and waterproof is so useful I take it with me everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Jon Whitty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I don't think the price corresponds to the product, but this is a darn good speaker. Pretty loud, but the sound did seem to diminish over time. Just recently did I blow one of the speakers out after about 8 months, contacted Logitech and they are supposedly sending a replacement but have not sent me any confirmation, or a new speaker yet. Lol. Would buy again, but at a lesser price.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the battery life! Often 12 hours at medium volume. My first gen pair only make it about an hour now. Range from a device is lowish about 30’ before reception problems. All and all a solid performer
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of technical issues with it. Buttons are not working like they’re suppose to, volume adjust on its own, can’t connect via Bluetooth. Tech support told me to update it and that didn’t help either. Very disappointed. Also didn’t know that Ultimate Ears is owned by Logitech which explains it. Will make sure that everybody I know to never buy products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money It has to be connected to the app to turn off. It continuously loses connection with my phone when I walk to the other side of patio. Wish I would have used it before the time ran out to return..:
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I loved this speaker and still do but there are some connectivity issues when trying to link more than 2 of these. Sound is fabulous and it is truly water resistant; accidentally left it outside one night in a rainstorm semi protected by a tree. The speaker wasn’t affected. Battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie M Knight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty awesome. Sounds great. Portable. Battery life is great but I think I was expecting more. It’s still phenomenal. You’ll get a whole day out of this thing. Throw it in your back pack. Bring it to the pool or beach. It’s wonderbar!
customer_reviews.author: Stopher

customer_reviews.title: Sounds wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband one and I loved it so I bought myself one. And I bought one for my daughter for her birthday because she was always using mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mamie Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Working well so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t gotten to use this too much but so far have been impressed with the sound. We may use this as a replacement for our boat stereo as well but it will work great around the camp fire as well as on our paddle boards. Love that it is waterproof and floats
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hegerty

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: Wish the sound was just a bit more rich but still a great value. Easy to pair, the app is best in the industry, it can fill a large room with decent bass and fantastic highs. I bring it everywhere and is an absolute necessity when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L. Martin

product_meta.title: Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker - Night Black
product_meta.description: Color:Night BlackUltimate Ears BOOM 3 is a super portable wireless speaker built for adventure. It rocks immersive 360° sound with deep bass, all carefully balanced so you can hear every note. But BOOM 3 also hangs tough. It’s seriously waterproof, dustproof, and drop proof which means you can bring vibes anywhere. From the desert festival to the pool party and everywhere in between. Plus BOOM 3 features the all new Magic Button so you can play, pause and skip songs directly on the Bluetooth speaker. And it is wrapped in a stunning, high performance fabric that shimmers. The ultimate go anywhere speaker just got more ultimate. Frequency Range 90Hz 20kHz
feature_bullets: Ultimate Sound: BOOM 3 delivers loud and immersive 360 degree sound with deep and accurate bass, all carefully balanced so you can hear every note

Powered for Adventure: Rechargeable battery stays powered and pumping tunes for 15 hours; Add the POWER UP charging dock (sold separately) to charge Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 wirelessly so it’s always ready to go on your next musical adventure

Super Portable and Durable: Waterproof Floats and Virtually Indestructible; BOOM 3 can be totally submerged in up to 1 meter of water for up to 30 minutes, passing seriously tough durability tests to handle life’s spills and thrills

All New Magic Button: Play, Pause, Skip and control any streaming music directly on the Bluetooth speaker with 1 touch of a button; Maximum Sound Level : 90dBA; Frequency Range: 90 Hertz to 20 Kilohertz
PartyUp: Use the Ultimate Ears app to pair 2, 3, 4…and over 150 BOOM and MEGABOOM speakers together for the ultimate sound experience; Works with any generation of BOOM and MEGABOOM speakers
Extreme Performance Fabric: BOOM 3 is covered in shimmering 2 tone fabric that’s tough, beautiful and engineered for extreme applications like motorcycle jackets and fire equipment
These are FCC regulated products: FCC ID JNZS00170

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,027 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #95 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#893 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
